column4: hey everyone, I'm trying to write to a tape backup drive using a barebones tar script and I'm only getting about 5.0 KiB/s write speeds
I'm reading from local disk, tried it with and without gzip
not sure if it could be a driver issue with my scsi card, the drive, or what
depending on the age of your equipment, you may want to make sure that your scsi bus is correctly terminated.
